headline: Why Is Andreas Halvorsen Bullish On Fortive Corporation (FTV) Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Billionaire Andreas Halvorsen’s Top 15 Long-Term Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Fortive Corporation (NYSE:FTV) stands against Andreas Halvorsen’s other long-term stock picks.
